tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  PARTICIPATION MATTERS  TOUGH GRADER
comments: I was disappointed at first, but as the weeks wore on, I have come to like Mrs. Janice Feldbauer. She does her lessons from a powerpoint which is accessible on the blackboard. She doesn\'t give out too much homework, but she is a harsh grader. She is quite friendly and responds to your emails right away. I would take another class with her.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: Currently taking professor Feldbauer this semester! I took her BUS230 class online - and I love it. Her grading is fair. Put in the effort, study the material, and you\'ll pass her class. It\'d be pretty difficult to fail her class, as the material is quite interesting. Overall, I\'d recommend this professor to students.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Professor Feldbauer was a good professor. Assignments were pretty easy and straightforward. A good class to throw in with a packed schedule if needed. I slacked on some of the work and ended up getting an 89, but that was just because of lack of effort. She\'s nice and understanding. Great online class and professor.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Not a bad teacher. Some things are just annoying, like all the blackboard assignments when it\'s not an online class. It\'s not a hard class to pass, because her test are easier if you show up for class and listen to her lectures. I would take her again. BTW, she gets defensive if you need to ask her a question about grading on any HW assignments.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Respected (1)
comments: I\'ve taken her before and every time she\'s inconsistent with grading and harsh. She says you need that specific version of the book which is a lie. Both times I found a previous version of the book online at TPB and worked just fine.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  RESPECTED
comments: Knows marketing very well. Makes you think outside of the box. Not much work

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Respected (1)
comments: She is fair and to the point. She does lecture from her power points which are on blackboard but she gives participation points if you are in class which help your final grade. Majority of homework assignments are from the book.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Even though this was a class in campus, more than half of EVERYTHING was done online. The discussion boards are incredibly unclear and responses are mandatory. Since everything is graded online, she hardly ever states why she graded so harshly.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Class was not too challenging, but got tired of offensive feedback/comments on almost every assignment. Very picky and very annoying.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Hard to stay awake boring.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Respected (1)
comments: VITAL: read the book, take notes. Exams are multiple choice and timed, but PLENTY of time. She\'s VERY specific on what is assigned to be in your DB\'s. They are easy to write. Don\'t skip any DB\'s, they were 45% of my grade. 30pts per DB. (If you do poor on an exam, you\'ll be happy you did well on the DB\'s!) She\'s great about reminding you via email.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Respected (1)
comments: The assignments are easy and worth a good amount, and you submit them online. If you show up and do the work there is no way to get under a 3.5 unless you try to.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Teacher is too hard on discussion boards. I use correct grammar and you have to alwayyss go back and check you db post or you will receive zero credit.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Respected (1)
comments: After returning to school after over 20 years the transition was easy with this prof. Everything is explained well. class participation is rewarded. All assignments are through blackboard. Tests are straight forward. Power points and chapter terms are in blackboard as well. I recommend her for smooth lesson plan.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Took course online. As others have said, use spellchecker or you will hear from her. Discussion boards are critical, as you will transfer DB posts to your final paper. Good posts help make the paper manageable. Pick a company that has plenty of information available; you will be reporting on that company the entire term. I had fun in this class.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Respected (1)
comments: I had her for both BUS 101 and 123. I found her to be very fair and interesting. The in class activities require you to be in attendance but you can miss 1. The power points follow the book and she gives you a review sheet for the tests. Do the work and you will get a good grade!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Respected (1)
comments: This teacher is rediculous. I figured I liked the class until I would email her and she would be rude to me. Then the work was all powerpoints which were never anything good in detail .. Her tests were a little difficult. Shes all about spelling on the hw, and if you do not do things the way SHE wants them done you basically fail.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Respected (1)
comments: I had a terrible experience with this professor. Her lectures are powerpoints that are also online but she does \'in-class activities\' that are graded and random throughout the semester. Basically grades on attendance. Very rude and doesn\'t like students who are smart enough to not have to listen to her dumb lectures.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Took online must do discussions to her expectations if you turn them in early you will have time to correct them before deadline. Tests are medium hard and spend time on your projects it will save you a lot of headache when it\'s time to do your final paper.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (4)  Participation matters (4)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Respected (1)
comments: This class was almost all discussion board. I took this class online & found that the amount of work was not that hard. You have multiple choice test & essay. 4 tests total (1 of which is the final) & then a capstone project. As long as you do the discussion board you have your paper basically written.
